name: Should the NCAA Continue To Move Back The 3-Point Line?
NCAA Basketball Game Predictions
description: R Shiny app showing XGBoost generated predictions for every men's and women's game in 2021 NCAA season. (Model created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)

name: Relationship Between Demographics and 2016 Election
description: Using linear models to explore relationship between county level demographics and voting outcomes in 2016 U.S. presidential election. (Model created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)

name: Analyzing Sales Performance for Daily Media Blitz
description: Using Tableau to visualize sales performance for a media company as they transition toward digital distribution streams. (Project created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)

name: DogeCoin Time Series Analysis
description: A time series analysis for the Dogecoin cryptocurrency utilizing ARIMA and GARCH models to explore possible future values of this volatile financial asset.

name: Using a Player's Exit Velocity and Launch Angle to Predict Home Runs
Predicting March Madness for Kaggle's March Machine Learning Mania Competition
description: XGBoost machine learning model to predict win probabilities for every hypothetical matchup in the 2021 NCAA basketball tournament.

name: Finding optimal locations for BNEDC to recruit from.
description: Used a K-Means Clustering Algorithm and XGBoost Model to identify the best counties for BNEDC to recruit from.
